overview:
Matthew Slight is a business owner and entrepreneur based out of London, UK.

He owns and runs the successful IT consultancy firm Incite ICT, providing SMBs with local services and project management nationally.

Matthew is also CEO of Social Food Media the company behind the EatSocial.net platform. His vision on this project has been to use food to bring communities together through the use of technology, media and social interaction. One fundamental ethos of the SFM model is that technology should be used to fuse and augment our everyday experience and provide a real output - and not just create an online “cyberspace” - it’s all about the offline experience.
